{{cpp/chrono/day/title|1=operator unsigned}}
{{cpp/chrono/day/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|
constexpr explicit operator unsigned() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns the day value stored in {{c|*this}}.

===Return value===
The day value stored in {{c|*this}}.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;chrono&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

int main()
{
    constexpr std::chrono::day d{15};
    constexpr unsigned day = static_cast&lt;unsigned&gt;(d);
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "The day is: " &lt;&lt; day &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
The day is: 15
}}
